metadata.title: Comparing Mechanical Keyboard Switches
metadata.description: Switch selection makes a huge difference in a mechanical keyboard. Start with our complete guide to mechanical keyboard switches to learn what's best for you.
metadata.author: Tony Sullivan
metadata.heroCaption: This is a glamour shot of the Commodore PET Mini
metadata.heroCredit: Photo by Shrimay Dash
metadata.descriptiont: Switch selection makes a huge difference in a mechanical keyboard. Start with our complete guide to mechanical keyboard switches to learn what's best for you.

metadata.title: Comparing Mechanical Keyboard Layout Sizes
metadata.description: Shopping for mechanical keyboards can be exhausting. Nail down the keyboard layout size that best fits your needs to narrow down the search early.
metadata.author: Tony Sullivan
metadata.heroCaption: Multicolored Keyboard Front of MacBook Pro

metadata.title: Best Mechanical Keyboards for Gaming
metadata.description: Whether competing professionally in eSports competitions or playing Fortnite on the weekends, a mechanical keyboard can really step up your game.
metadata.author: Tony Sullivan
